content:
Hi everyone!

I've been learning Rust for ~1 year, for both work and fun! Have mostly been writing Erlang for a few years now but wanted to learn systems programming. I find that the combo of Erlang + Rust (nif for maths) is extremely solid.

Published my first crate gogo a few days ago (a very simple CLI bookmark manager). I hope one day I can contribute to many other Rust projects.

Cheers!
